title: Bella Thorne embraces naked dress trend at Venice Film Festival
text:
22-year-old Bella Thorne wowed on the Venice Film Festival red carpet on Saturday [Photo: Getty Images]

Barely-there red carpet dresses have become somewhat of a trend over the last few years, and now, there’s another Bella who has everyone clutching at their pearls.

Bella Thorne arrived at the 76th Venice Film Festival wearing a plunging see-through black dress on the red carpet.

READ MORE: Bella Thorne has been accused of misleading fans with ‘damaging’ skincare video

She was joined by her boyfriend Benjamin Mascolo, 26, where they attended the premiere of Joaquin Phoenix’s highly anticipated film, The Joker, at the Grand Sala.

And all eyes were on the 21-year-old who arrived in a very revealing ensemble.

Bella Thorne wore a barely-there dress by Italian designer Alexandre Vauthier to the Venice Film Festival on Saturday [Photo: Getty Images] More

Bella wore a ‘naked’ chainmail-style dress by Italian label Philsophy di Lorenzo Serafina, which is known for its edgy, yet romantic, style.

The crystal and metallic stud mesh asymmetric dress featured an ultra-high slit with ruffle detail, and the sheer fabric showed off her incredible figure, displaying underwear.

READ MORE: All the best fashion looks from the 2019 Venice Film Festival

The sequinned ensemble also featured a luxe velvet criss cross in the back, showing off Bella’s new tattoo - which she posted about on Instagram in July - that reads “Bruised But Not Broken”.

Bella Thorne and her boyfriend Benjamin Mascolo sent hearts racing on the red carpet during the 76th Venice Film Festival [Photo: Getty Images] More

She finished her look with a chunky grunge-style choker and strappy black open-toe sandals.

It’s not the first time the former Disney star has worn a barely-there dress. Back in 2016, the actress arrived at the Critics Choice Awards in a half-sequinned, half-sheer Steven Khalil gown.

READ MORE: Julie Andrews, 83, returns to the red carpet to accept Lifetime Achievement Award

It was similar to Bella Hadid’s famous number at the Cannes Film Festival in the same year.

Supermodel Bella Hadid wore a daring hip-high slit dress at the Cannes Film Festival in 2016 [Photo: Getty Images] More

The 20-year-old Hadid had the internet in a tailspin when she arrived at the premiere of the Dardenne Brother’s drama La Fille Inconnue wearing daring red Alexandre Vauthier gown with a slit that went above the thigh.

The look became the Hadid sister’s most memorable and earned her the honour of wearing the event’s sexiest outfit.
description: The former Disney star turned heads in Venice on Saturday
